title: Kong
description: * Make quick GIFs of yourself.* Share to WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, Twitter, and more.* Swipe for filters, add type.* Create private channels for you and your friends.@kong
descriptionHTML:
* Make quick GIFs of yourself.
* Share to WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, Twitter, and more.
* Swipe for filters, add type.
* Create private channels for you and your friends.

@kong
comments: Won't let me delete stuff It's a good app no doubt but I can't seem to delete anything, when I press the delete button nothing happens then I refresh the page and it's still there. Other than that it's a dope app
This app Sucks it takes me a long time to register my account
Gif fun I like making gifs to send to people its fun and kong makes it easy
Love the new profiles! Such a fun way to chat with my friends
It's Getting Better Bugs here and there but it seems to be getting better.
recentChanges: You can now respond to any Kong post, meaning every GIF in Kong can become a kongversation. (Yeah yeah, we know that’s an awful pun.)
You can respond in two ways:
● REACT with a Kong post of your own (custom reaction GIFs for the win!)
● COMMENT with words, using our new Text filter
Simply tap on any Kong post, then tap the ’React’ or ’Comment’ button to reply.
[Imagine an enthusiastic thumbs-up Kong reaction GIF here, as we’re only allowed text...]
